channel.title: Posts on David Chen

item.title: Website Creation
item.description: In this post, I will explain how I created this website. This will include what resources I used, how I combined blogdown in R with GitHub Pages, and the various changes required for it to function correctly. I will assume the user has already created a github.io page and linked GitHub and RStudio. I will assume familiarity with GitHub and R in general. If the two assumptions are met, and the user does not spend too long choosing themes, the basic setup should not take more than 20 minutes.
